title: DugongCMD
description: Desktop-as-a-Service for Bioinformatics. Includes: Jupyter Notebook, BioConda, LinuxBrew, among other features.
name: DugongCMD

title: DugongGUI XFCE4
description: Desktop-as-a-Service for Bioinformatics. Includes: Jupyter Notebook, BioConda, LinuxBrew, among other features.
name: DugongGUI XFCE4

title: DugongGUI IceWM
description: Desktop-as-a-Service for Bioinformatics. Includes: Jupyter Notebook, BioConda, LinuxBrew, among other features.
name: DugongGUI IceWM

title: DugongClean CMD
description: Desktop-as-a-Service for Bioinformatics. Includes: Jupyter Notebook, BioConda, LinuxBrew, among other features.
name: DugongClean CMD

title: DugongClean XFCE4
description: Desktop-as-a-Service for Bioinformatics. Includes: Jupyter Notebook, BioConda, LinuxBrew, among other features.

env.name: ENABLE_TTS_INSTALL
env.label: Enables TTS Install
env.description: Enables the Test Tool Shed during container startup. This change is not persistent.

env.name: GALAXY_LOGGING
env.label: Galaxy Logging
env.description: Enables for verbose logging at Docker stdout.

env.name: BARE
env.label: Disable All tools
env.description: Disables all default Galaxy tools.

env.name: NONUSE
env.label: Disable Services
env.description: Disable services during container startup. Currently, nodejs, postgres, proftp, reports, slurmd and slurmctld are supported.

env.name: UWSGI_PROCESSES
env.label: UWSGI Processes
env.description: Set the number of uwsgi processes.

env.name: UWSGI_THREADS
env.label: UWSGI Threads
env.description: Set the number of uwsgi threads.

env.name: GALAXY_DOCKER_ENABLED
env.label: Use Docker
env.description: Enable Galaxy to use Docker containers if annotated in tools.

env.name: GALAXY_DOCKER_VOLUMES
env.label: Docker Volume
env.description: Specify volumes that should be mounted into tool containers.

env.name: GALAXY_HANDLER_NUMPROCS
env.label: Galaxy Handler
env.description: Set the number of Galaxy handler.

env.name: LOAD_GALAXY_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCIES
env.label: Opt Dependencies
env.description: Installing optional dependencies into the Galaxy virtual environment.

env.name: LOAD_PYTHON_DEV_DEPENDENCIES
env.label: Dev Dependencies
env.description: Installation of Galaxy's dev dependencies. Needs LOAD_GALAXY_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCIES as well

title: Galaxy: UseGalaxy.org
description: Galaxy Docker repository with tools from usegalaxy.org (UseGalaxy.org Platform).
name: Galaxy: UseGalaxy.org

env.label: UWSGI Processes
env.description: Set the number of uwsgi processes.

env.name: UWSGI_THREADS
env.label: UWSGI Threads
env.description: Set the number of uwsgi threads.

env.name: GALAXY_DOCKER_ENABLED
env.label: Use Docker
env.description: Enable Galaxy to use Docker containers if annotated in tools.

env.name: GALAXY_DOCKER_VOLUMES
env.label: Docker Volume
env.description: Specify volumes that should be mounted into tool containers.

env.name: GALAXY_HANDLER_NUMPROCS
env.label: Galaxy Handler
env.description: Set the number of Galaxy handler.

env.name: LOAD_GALAXY_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCIES
env.label: Opt Dependencies
env.description: Installing optional dependencies into the Galaxy virtual environment.

env.name: LOAD_PYTHON_DEV_DEPENDENCIES
env.label: Dev Dependencies
env.description: Installation of Galaxy's dev dependencies. Needs LOAD_GALAXY_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCIES as well
